page.title: 14Woodlesford Girl Guides
page.content: Guides were formed 75 years ago by a man named Baden Powell, on Saturday 29th of June was a celebration for 75 years of Guides. It took place at Roundhay park. You wear a plain blue shirt with a neckerchief which you tie up with a toggle. To be a proper guide you have to do 8 good turns,then you are put to a test and you have to say a motto. Guides are really related to the church and sometimes you talk about God. Every month Guides go to church,other companies go aswell but they are not guides. When you are actually at Guides you play games and make things,you also do things in your patrol like jogging,putting make up on and helping other people.
